Key_Responsibilities.role: Lead and architected the complete mobile application
Key_Responsibilities.details: Overseeing the full product lifecycle from development to deployment on Android and iOS using React Native.
Automated infrastructure setup, enabling seamless static asset uploads to Amazon S3 via CloudFront, improving app performance and reducing latency.
Spearheaded the migration of a Vue.js microsite to Next.js, significantly enhancing performance, SEO, and frontend responsiveness.
Bridged the gap between product and engineering, managing end-to-end development for both mobile applications and SaaS web platforms while guiding a cross-functional team.
Developed a caching mechanism in Node.js, reducing operational costs and optimizing system performance for high-traffic environments.
Implemented an end-to-end (E2E) testing pipeline using Playwright, automating test execution and storing test reports in an S3 bucket for continuous monitoring.
Managed development, code reviews, requirement gathering, and client interaction, ensuring efficient project execution and stakeholder communication.
Optimized microsites for brands using Next.js with Server-Side Rendering (SSR), enhancing SEO and reducing page load times through performance tuning and analytics.
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs for lead management, real-time reporting, and data synchronization, leveraging Node.js and Express for scalability and efficiency.
Built a full-stack service booking platform using React, Redux, Node.js, and MongoDB for customers and employees.
Designed a scalable backend with Express.js, ensuring smooth API interactions and real-time service updates.
Implemented Redux for state management, enabling seamless data flow and improved user experience.
Optimized MongoDB schema design for faster data retrieval and efficient storage.
Integrated Salesforce APIs to automate customer workflows and streamline post-sales operations.

Engineered an IoT control system from scratch to manage sauna devices using MQTT, the Publish-Subscribe (Pub-Sub) pattern, and AWS IoT Core, enabling real-time communication between devices and the mobile application.
Developed key components in the Sunlighten React Native app, improving performance, UI stability, and overall user experience.
Diagnosed and fixed critical bugs in the existing Sunlighten website to enhance reliability and maintainability.
Built multiple interactive UI components for Sunlighten.com using React and GraphQL, improving frontend interactivity and responsiveness.
